attributes.action: Stop universities charging students for accommodation fees throughout COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: With full-time, part-time and zero hour work now being restricted. The finance students receive from Student Finance England would become the only source of income during COVID-19 pandemic. This petition is calling for all those effected by this to have the right IF staying at home and not in student accommodation to keep there payment for April 2020.
attributes.background: To allow all university students who have returned home in the wake of COVID-19 to keep the portion their maintenance loan that goes to paying accommodation fees.
